sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 他努力维持家庭的和谐。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā nǔlì wéichí jiātíng de héxié.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il s'efforce de maintenir l'harmonie familiale.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He works hard to maintain family harmony.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nǐ yǒu Wēixìn ma?
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: As-tu WeChat ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Do you have WeChat?

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 她戴着一条红色的围巾。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā dàizhe yī tiáo hóngsè de wéijīn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Elle porte une écharpe rouge.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: She is wearing a red scarf.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Xiǎogǒu yáozhe wěiba.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le petit chien remue la queue.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The puppy is wagging its tail.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng zhǎo yī gè wèizhì zuòxià.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez trouver une place et vous asseoir.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please find a seat and sit down.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ jiēshòu nǐ de yāoqǐng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'accepte ton invitation.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I accept your invitation.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè jiā jiǔdiàn wèiyú shì zhōngxīn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cet hôtel est situé au centre-ville.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This hotel is located in the city center.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Diàntī zhèngzài wéixiū zhōng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'ascenseur est en réparation.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The elevator is under repair.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā shuō de wèibì shì zhēn de.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce qu'il dit n'est pas forcément vrai.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: What he said may not be true.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Jīngjì xíngshì yuèláiyuè wěndìng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La situation économique devient de plus en plus stable.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The economic situation is becoming more stable.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nǐ zǒulù yào wěn yīdiǎn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Tu devrais marcher plus prudemment.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: You should walk more steadily.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè dào cài yǒudiǎnr wèir.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce plat a un peu de goût.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This dish has a bit of flavor.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ wúfǎ lǐjiě tā de xiǎngfǎ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je ne peux pas comprendre sa façon de penser.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I cannot understand his way of thinking.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Jīntiān tài wúliáo le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Aujourd'hui c'est trop ennuyeux.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Today is so boring.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā shēnshang wú fēnwén.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il n'a pas un sou sur lui.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He doesn't have a penny on him.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 无论发生什么，我都支持你。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wúlùn fāshēng shénme, wǒ dōu zhīchí nǐ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Quoi qu'il arrive, je te soutiens.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: No matter what happens, I will support you.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 请代我向你的家人问候。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng dài wǒ xiàng nǐ de jiārén wènhòu.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez transmettre mes salutations à votre famille.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please send my regards to your family.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā de xīnlǐ zhuàngtài bú tài hǎo.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Son état psychologique n'est pas très bon.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: His mental state is not very good.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 花园里开满了五颜六色的花。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Huāyuán lǐ kāimǎn le wǔyánliùsè de huā.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le jardin est rempli de fleurs multicolores.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The garden is full of colorful flowers.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā duì zhè jiàn shì wúsuǒwèi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il s'en fiche de cette affaire.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He doesn't care about this matter.
